DataElement.preferredName: EQ-5D-5L Pain or Discomfort 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of their health state today as related to pain or discomfort, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Questionnaire Domain European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire Pain or Discomfort Today Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire._A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient._A question about an individual's current pain or discomfort._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire.

Property.preferredName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire Pain or Discomfort Today Status
Property.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.:A question about an individual's current pain or discomfort.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.longName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.
A question about an individual's current pain or discomfort.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CDSIC aligned NCI Standard CRFs. wz

ValueDomain.preferredName: EQ-5D-5L Pain or Discomfort 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A five point ordered reference standard that describes current health state related to pain or discomfort using the EQ-5D-5L questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.value: I have extreme pain or discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had extreme pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had extreme pain or discomfort.

PermissibleValues.value: I have moderate pain or discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate pain or discomfort.

PermissibleValues.value: I have no pain or discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no pain or discomfort.

PermissibleValues.value: I have severe pain or discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe pain or discomfort.

PermissibleValues.value: I have slight pain or discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had slight pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had slight pain or discomfort.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: EQ-5D-5L:EuroQol Group, 5 Dimension, 3 Level, Health Questionnaire Version 1.0, English Version for the USA, 2009
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for PRO-HRQoL as part of the Round 6 CRF Data Collection Standards. mc 2/12/15

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 4718159 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Questionnaire EQ-5D-5L Test Code Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Test cods of questionnaire questions associated with the European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale (EQ-5D-5L) for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Standard Data Tabulation Model (SDTM).
